item.title: Academic SEMINAR
item.description: Professor Mengmeng Guo from the School of Finance at Nanjing Agricultural University was invited to give a seminar titled “Flooded Venture: Extreme Rainfall and Entrepreneurship” at HKUST (GZ) and to participate in our group meeting.

item.title: Xiangzhang economic academic workshop
item.description: PhD student Jiao Xiong attended the Xiangzhang Economic Academic Workshop, where she delivered a talk titled “Technological Change from Fossil Fuels to Renewables: Evidence from Offshore Energy.

item.title: Greater Bay Area Science Forum
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu attended the 2024 Greater Bay Area Science Forum’s Green Energy Industry Science and Technology Innovation Sub-Forum and visited the Big Data Center for Guangdong Offshore Wind in Yangjiang City.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: PhD student Jiao Xiong participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Technological change from fossil-fuel to renewable: Evidence from offshore energy”.

item.title: World AI for Science Competition
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to serve as a judge for the social science track of the 2nd World AI4S Prize.

item.title: ENERGY TRANSITION AND CLIMATE FINANCE WORKSHOP
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to attend the workshop on “Sustainable Future: Energy Transition and Climate Finance” in Southwestern University of Finance and Economics and give a talk.

item.title: Tianjin University Economics doctoral Academic Forum
item.description: PhD student Zhenhuan Yang was invited to attend the 6th Tianjin University Economics Doctoral Academic Forum and make an academic report titled:Raining on Bonds: The Financing Costs of Extreme Rain on Urban Investment Bonds.

item.title: INTERNATIONAL SOCIETY FOR ENERGY TRANSITION STUDIES ANNUAL CONFERENCE
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu and PhD student Xiong Jiao attended the annual conference of the International Society for Energy Transition Studies.

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: Professor Pinghan Liang from the School of Government at Sun Yat-sen University was invited to deliver a lecture on the topic:Why is there so much surveillance in China? An Explanation from a Fiscal Perspective.

item.title: Academic Visiting
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu visited the University of Orleans and the Paris School of Economics and delivered a talk from October 4th to 6th.

item.title: CNCC Workshop
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu attended the Carbon Pricing and Climate Change in the Data-rich World Workshop held by CNCC Trust and gave a talk titled “Raining on Bonds: The Financing Costs of Extreme Rain on Urban Investment Bonds”.

item.title: Global China Fellows Summit
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to attend the 2024 Global China Fellows Summit and gave a policy round table talk from July 11 to 13.

item.title: China in the Global Economy - Kiel-Göttingen-CEPR Conference
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to attend the China in the Global Economy - Kiel-Göttingen-CEPR Conference and presented her work titled “Growing the Economy with Green Regulation: Evidence from Industrial Firm Productivity in China”.

item.title: The International Workshop on Regional Air Quality Management in Rapidly Developing Economic Regions
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to attend the 7th International Workshop on Regional Air Quality Management in Rapidly Developing Economic Regions (7RAQM), served as the host of a parallel session, and presented her work titled “Evidence from Environmental Regulation and Industrial Firm Productivity in China”.

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to speak at the policy round table in the Division of Public Policy at HKUST.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
We are here to help you

Are you curious about something? Please feel free to contact us, our customer service center is working for you 24/7.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Lu, Y., & Pless, J. (2024). Greening to Grow: Evidence from Environmental Regulation and Industrial Firm Productivity in China. Available at SSRN 5014283.
